long_description: Warmly insulated with Polartec(R) Alpha(R), the women's Strata Jacket from Rab is your best friend on cold, dry days and mountain escapes. Pertex(R) Microlight shell is very lightweight yet windproof, soft and durable. Polartec Alpha 80g insulation delivers lightweight warmth and breathability; it's also highly stable, so that mesh and open-weave fabrics can be used as backings. Extra insulation is placed where you need it most, such as the front core. Polyester-mesh and woven-nylon panels on the inside enhance breathability. Chin guard at neck protects sensitive skin from chafing. Zippered hand pockets are concealed in the side seams. Zippered internal chest pocket doubles as a stuff sack. Hem drawcord and elasticized cuffs help seal weather out, warmth in. The women's Rab Strata Jacket features a slim fit.
short_description: Warmly insulated with Polartec(R) Alpha(R), the women's Strata Jacket from Rab is your best friend on cold, dry days and mountain escapes.
